flixel.tweens.motion.CircularMotion

type
class
extends
Motion
Determines a circular motion.

complete Optional completion callback.
type Tween type.

The current position on the circle.

The circumference of the current circle motion.

inherited from flixel.tweens.FlxTween

inherited from flixel.tweens.FlxTween
How many times this tween has been executed / has finished so far - useful to stop the LOOPING and PINGPONG types after a certain amount of time

cancel() : Void

inherited from flixel.tweens.FlxTween
Immediately stops the Tween and removes it from its Tweener without calling the complete callback.

inherited from flixel.tweens.motion.Motion

inherited from flixel.tweens.motion.Motion

setMotion(CenterX : Float, CenterY : Float, Radius : Float, Angle : Float, Clockwise : Bool, DurationOrSpeed : Float, ?UseDuration : Bool, ?Ease : flixel.tweens.EaseFunction) : CircularMotion

parameters
CenterX X position of the circle's center.
CenterY Y position of the circle's center.
Radius Radius of the circle.
Angle Starting position on the circle.
Clockwise If the motion is clockwise.
DurationOrSpeed Duration of the movement.
UseDuration Duration of the movement.
Eease Optional easer function.
Starts moving along a circle.

inherited from flixel.tweens.motion.Motion

start() : Dynamic

inherited from flixel.tweens.FlxTween
